name: Photo Roulette Game
description:
Welcome to the Photo Roulette Game! This is a game where you can compete with your friends in a multiplayer mode (up to 8 people) in quickly guessing the owner of a random photo which is shown to all users at the same time.

Rules are pretty simple:
- Choose the random pack of your photos, which will be shown to other players
- Create game lobby or join to the existing one using PIN
- Invite friends to start the game
- Play game and guess the owner of randomly shown photo in each round
- Get your game score and awards!

Try Photo Roulette Game and be the fastest and accurate player who will take the1st place!
